attributes.review: This app is pressured into handing over data or other intelligence to the Chinese communist party it is tracking our  every move even when the app is closed  and it is a States and national security risk.

attributes.review:
I tried this app and wanted to see what Donald planned to do for 2020 and see what his plans were. 
All I can say is that he is doing horrible and has bad plans, how do people like this you people are insane, disgusting.

attributes.review: I got this app to see any updates on Donald , like about his upcoming death.. but I found NOTHING. I truly thought they’d mention his death and how it’ll happen on August 23 but unfortunately they didn’t.
attributes.title: waste of space

attributes.review: so, i first opened this app, to find so much orange, that it blinded me!!! i was rushed to the er in excruciating pain. once i got my sight back, i opened the app to check for updates, and then died of a heart attack. the autopsy confirms my death was not caused by and underlying health condition, but rather, the amount of racism and hypocrisy my nervous system just could not handle 😔 download at your own risk! ✨🧚‍♀️ gen z is coming for you trump
attributes.title: i died after opening this app

attributes.review: This app is sooo lame it’s glitching and they can’t say it’s my phone bc I just got my phone like 3 moths ago and and it’s still working very much fine app instead of deleting tiktok delete this app

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app (which took a week to do so) it wouldn’t let me open it, and immediately crashed. Now my entire App Store keeps crashing. This app is DISGUSTING and needs to be taken down ASAP.

attributes.review: I wanted to try and help trumps campaign, but no matter what I try my phone will not open the app, it’s like my phone hates trump or something? I don’t understand but I’m blaming trump for it. This app should get deleted

attributes.review: First off, why a phone number? I dont want texts. Anyways. First thing I see when I open this app, is a Cheeto man staring at me. I feel very uncomfortable. Really creepy. Made my phone lag. Horrible app dont get it.
